name: vpn-cuba-simple
description: Sistema completo de VPN Cuba con bot de Telegram y panel de administración

scripts.setup-pm2: npm install -g pm2@latest && pm2 startup && npm run pm2-start && pm2 save
scripts.setup-full: npm run setup && npm run setup-pm2
scripts.health: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/health').then(r => r.text()).then(d => console.log('Health:', d)).catch(e => console.log('Error:', e.message))"
scripts.backup: mkdir -p backups && cp -r uploads backups/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Backup creado'
scripts.deploy: npm run pm2-stop && git pull && npm install && npm run pm2-start
scripts.test-health: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/health | python3 -m json.tool || curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/health
scripts.test: echo 'Ejecutando tests básicos...' && npm run test-health

author: VPN Cuba Team
